steps.processorData:
select
    a/context/start_time/value as created,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0002]/value/value as Outcome,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0009]/value/value as TryContactAtLaterDate,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0014]/value/value as FollowUpDate,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0007]/items[at0015]/value/value as ReasonNoContactRequired,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0018]/value/value as Comments,
    e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/id/value
from EHR e contains 
top 1
COMPOSITION a
contains EVALUATION a_a[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.covid19_post_discharge_outcome.v0]
where e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/id/value = :mrn
order by created desc
offset 0 limit 100
